content: {"name": "Bradley Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Pantry provides patrons with a grocery shopping experience, enabling them to choose the food and personal items they and their families need. This space provides the opportunity for patrons to sit inside. The Pantry asks all who come for assistance to arrive after 9am Monday to Saturday and after 5:30pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays, as lining up outside will not be permitted.\n", "email": "", "url": "www.bradleyfoodpantry.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "101 3rd Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Bradley Beach", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07720", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.1983542, "longitude": -74.0082901}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 775-0161", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Temporarily closed"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Accepts Walk-ins & Appointments"}]}
